metadata.description: Name of the custom connector, if you want to change the default name, make sure to use the same in all ThreatX automation playbooks as well
As per documentation of Threatx use the default url provided (provision.threatx.io). If still required please change Do NOT prefix with https:// or http:// etc

properties.description:
[concat(parameters('CustomConnectorName'), 'connects to ThreatX WAF service end point to runs any ThreatX supported API get/post calls and gives response back in JSON format. 

Note: For better understanding , check https://support.threatx.com/')]

info.title: ThreatX
info.description: This custom connector connects to ThreatX WAF service end point to runs any ThreatX supported API get/post calls and gives response back in JSON format.
